name: Border Patrol
storyline: As a newly appointed border officer, you are assigned to a crucial border checkpoint in a turbulent nation where border security is of utmost importance. Through a series of inspections, investigations, and decisions, you must maintain the safety and order of the border. Throughout this journey, you will face various moral and ethical challenges, making choices between justice and personal gain. Ultimately, your decisions will determine the nation's future, whether it leads to peace and prosperity or descends into chaos and conflict.
summary: Border Patrol is a 2D comic-style simulation game where players take on the role of a border officer responsible for inspecting incoming and outgoing vehicles, searching for contraband, and dealing with corruption and forgery.
